column5: Is this website reliable? I just priced a reel before the credit card info and it only had like $2 shipping and handleing...Is this to fair to be true?  Just looking to see if this site is reliable and wont rip me off with my credit card information.  Thanks, MTBF  http://www.all-americanoutdoors.com/home

I added an item to my cart and entered my postal code so it could estimate shipping.  It gave me this:  Available shipping options:  International Orders - Exact amount via USPS - Calculate at ship time  Your answer, Mike:  If you buy the reel, expect your credit card to be charged additional shipping at a later date once they calculate the exact price.  This has nothing to do with the site's integrity.
you are in college AND have a credit card...  better hope the beer store doesn't start taking em too
Lol I use use my CC at the Beer Store all the time
McAfee site advisor says it's good!!!  ... with a name like American in the title... yanno it's gotta be excellent!!!
That just goes to show how long it's been that I have bought beer,  One Day at a Time

Have ordered from them a couple of times in the past - shipping was about $10 and I was charged the exact amount as was listed on the package. That was nice to see for a change.  Reputable company and I've had no issues..  Good Fishing,  Justin
A few other members have bought products from them and have had good things to say. If you use the search function you should find some of the posts.

I know Garrett has used them and like kickingfrog said, a few others.  There were a few posts about them a year or so ago, nothing bad was said about them. And their prices are great.  PM Garrett, if I recall correctly, you could quote OFC and they will help you out. Dont know if thats still going on though.

They are a most excellent site. I have purchased reels from them over the last few years and never had an issue with them. I how ever can not address the shipping question but can vouch for their integrity.   Art
